sense.def:
One's land
ali
one's lands
je ozemlje, ki ga ima nekdo v lasti.

Land
ali
the land
se nanaša na del sveta, ki je trden, v nasprotju z morjem ali zrakom.

seg.quote: We turned away from land and headed out to sea.

sense.def:
A particular land
je določena pokrajina;

seg.quote: ...a land where there is never any rain.
Australia is the land of opportunities.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj ali nekdo
lands somewhere
, pride nekje na tla ali v vodo, potem ko se je premikal po zraku.

seg.quote: The last man slipped and landed in the water.

sense.def:
To land people or goods somewhere
pomeni osebe ali blago nekje odložiti po koncu potovanja, predvsem z ladjo.

seg.quote: ...small ships sailing from Florida to land arms and combatants.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
lands in an unpleasant situation
ali kadar nekaj
lands someone in an unpleasant situation
, se tisti človek znajde v neprijetnem položaju;

seg.quote: That would have landed him in jail.

sense.def:
To land someone with something
pomeni povzročiti, da se mora nekdo ukvarjati z nečim, kar povzroča težave;

seg.quote: You landed us with that awful man.

sense.def:
To land up in a particular place or situation
pomeni prispeti na določen kraj ali v določen položaj po dolgem potovanju ali na koncu vrste dogodkov.
